name: Chon-Ji
meaning: Chon Ji means literally the Heaven and The Earth. It is in the orient interpreted as the creation of the world or the beginning of human history. Therefore it is the initial pattern performed by the beginner. This pattern consists of two separate parts, one to represent the Heaven, the other the Earth.

moves.title: parallel ready stance
moves.description: Parallel ready stance.

moves.title: walking stance block
moves.description: Turn 90° left into left walking stance. Low outer forearm block.

moves.title: walking stance punch
moves.description: Step forward to 9 o'clock into right walking stance. Middle punch.

moves.title: walking stance block
moves.description: Pivot 180° clockwise on the left foot to face 3 o'clock. Right walking stance. Low outer forearm block.

moves.title: walking stance punch
moves.description: Step forward to 3 o'clock into left walking stance. Middle punch.

moves.title: walking stance block
moves.description: Turn 90° left to face 12 o'clock. Left walking stance. Low outer forearm block.

moves.title: walking stance punch
moves.description: Step forward into right walking stance. Middle punch.

moves.title: walking stance block
moves.description: Pivot 180° clockwise on the left foot to face 6 o'clock. Right walking stance. Low outer forearm block.

moves.title: walking stance punch
moves.description: Step forward into left walking stance. Middle punch.

moves.title: l-stance block
moves.description: Turn 90° left to face 3 o'clock. Right L-stance. Middle inner forearm block.

moves.title: walking stance punch
moves.description: Step forward into right walking stance. Middle punch.

moves.title: l-stance block
moves.description: Pivot 180° clockwise on the left foot to face 9 o'clock. Left L-stance. Middle inner forearm block.

moves.title: walking stance punch
moves.description: Step forward into left walking stance. Middle punch.

moves.title: l-stance block
moves.description: Turn 90° left to face 6 o'clock. Right L-stance. Middle inner forearm block.

moves.title: walking stance punch
moves.description: Step forward into right walking stance. Middle punch.

moves.title: l-stance block
moves.description: Pivot 180° clockwise on the left foot to face 12 o'clock. Left L-stance. Middle inner forearm block.

moves.title: walking stance punch
moves.description: Step forward into left walking stance. Middle punch.

moves.title: walking stance punch
moves.description: Step forward into right walking stance. Middle punch.

moves.title: walking stance punch
moves.description: Step backward into left walking stance. Middle punch.

moves.title: walking stance punch
moves.description: Step backward into right walking stance. Middle punch.

moves.title: parallel ready stance
moves.description: Return left foot to parallel ready stance.
